title.full: Dont Be Late For Your Date
title.reduced: Dont Be Late For Your Date

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. When you finally get a hot date, you don’t want to be late. Collect the coins to buy the items for the date, but don’t take your time as you are against the clock. Also watch out for police speed traps along the way.
description.short: When you finally get a hot date, you don’t want to be late. Collect the coins to buy the items for the date, but don’t take your time as you are against the clock. Also watch out for police speed traps along the way.
